info.title: Context Meal for Glucose Meter

glucose.meal.name: glucose.meal
glucose.meal.description: This Resource describes the Properties associated with context meal. Preprandial means pre-meal. Postprandial means post-meal. Fasting means the effect of long-term absence of food intake (overnight). The meal Property is a read-only value that is provided by the Server.

meal.description: Time of day when the measurement is taken.
